frontMatter.title: Your Guide to Java Streams
frontMatter.summary: In this edition of "Best of DZone," we take a look at Streams in Java, one of the APIs that brought some elements of functional programming to Java.

prev.title: 推荐一个Medium的展望软件开发2020的文章
